faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Get answers to common questions about our platform

question1.question: How does the escrow service work?
question1.answer: Our escrow service securely holds rental payments until equipment is delivered and the rental period is complete. This protects both equipment owners and renters from fraud.

question2.question: What types of equipment can I list or rent?
question2.answer: We support all types of heavy machinery including excavators, bulldozers, cranes, loaders, compactors, and specialized construction equipment. All equipment must meet safety standards.

question3.question: How are equipment owners verified?
question3.answer: We conduct comprehensive verification including business registration checks, equipment documentation review, and on-site inspections for high-value equipment.

question4.question: What insurance coverage is available?
question4.answer: All rentals include comprehensive insurance covering equipment damage, liability, and operator coverage. Additional options are available.

question5.question: How long does it take to start renting my equipment?
question5.answer: After verification is complete (typically 2-3 business days), you can list immediately. Most owners see their first booking within a week.
